name: Suspicious Reconnaissance Activity Using Get-LocalGroupMember Cmdlet
description: Detects suspicious reconnaissance command line activity on Windows systems using the PowerShell Get-LocalGroupMember Cmdlet
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)

detection.query:
selection_cmdlet: {"CommandLine|contains": "Get-LocalGroupMember "}
selection_group: {"CommandLine|contains": ["domain admins", " administrator", " administrateur", "enterprise admins", "Exchange Trusted Subsystem", "Remote Desktop Users", "Utilisateurs du Bureau \u00e0 distance", "Usuarios de escritorio remoto"]}
